## KeyboardAdaptorProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [KeyboardAdaptor](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptor.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface KeyboardAdaptorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dampingFactor?](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptorprops.dampingfactor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Only used for continuous adaptor, value between 0 and 1. Defaults to 0.5 |
|  [incrementor?](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptorprops.incrementor.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Only used for continuous adaptor, the amount to increment the target value on each keydown event. Defaults to 1 |
|  [keyMapping?](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptorprops.keymapping.md) | [KeyMapping](./three-story-controls.keymapping.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Default key mapping uses forward/backward/up/down/left/right as semanic labels, with WASD and arrow keys mapped appropriately: |
|  [preventBubbling?](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptorprops.preventbubbling.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Prevent event bubbling. Defaults to true |
|  [type](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptorprops.type.md) | [KeyboardAdaptorType](./three-story-controls.keyboardadaptortype.md) | 'discrete' or 'continuous' |
